message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product! It's one of our top-of-the-line items, and I'm confident you'll love it. Would you like to take it off my hands for $100?
I'll take it, but I'm not sure if I'll actually like it yet.

I'm not sure if I can trust you yet. I just got lucky on the first one. I'd like to wait and see what the next product is before making another decision.

I completely understand your hesitation, Bob! I appreciate your cautious approach. Let me assure you that this next product is another top-notch item, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with it. In fact, it's one of our most popular products, and I've received rave reviews from previous customers. Would you like to give it a try for $100?
I'm not convinced. You said the last one was a 'hidden gem' and it turned out to be a dud. I'm not sure if I should trust your descriptions.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I apologize if my previous description didn't quite meet your expectations. I want to assure you that I'm being completely transparent with you.
